variations.template: You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.
rts: You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.

variations.template: You may sacrifice a creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.

variations.template: You may pay {2}{R} and sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.

variations.template: You may sacrifice an artifact or creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.
rts: You may sacrifice an artifact or creature in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.
